topicRulePayload.sql: SELECT *, timestamp() as timestamp, topic() as topic, uuid() as id, timestamp() + 2592000 as expirationTime, 'pending' as status FROM 'devices/data'
topicRulePayload.description: Processa mensagens MQTT e salva no DynamoDB com timestamp e TTL

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: API para consultar e confirmar processamento de mensagens MQTT
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: Messages Service
